# finishSyncing(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Waits for the directory sync to complete, without showing any user interface.

## Declaration

```swift
func finishSyncing(completionHandler completion: @escaping () -> Void)
```

```swift
func finishSyncing() async
```

## Discussion

Use this method to wait if your app displays its own syncing UI.

## Syncing a directory

- **finishSyncing(_:completionHandler:)**: Waits for the directory sync to complete, showing the sync’s progress in a modal alert.
